//branch delete dialog Delete Branch You are about to delete a branch with transactions already carried out impacting your financial. Are you sure you want to delete? No, cancel Yes, delete my branch
Delete Company We will permanently delete below following data :\n\n - Ledger Group & Sub Group\n- Ledgers\n- Items & Category\n- Unit\n- Contacts\n- Item Stock\n\n Are you sure that you want to delete\n You can not undo this action. Yes, delete my company
//delete sale/purchase/payment/receipt dialog
Delete Sale? This will permanently delete sale. You won\'t be able to revert this! Delete Purchase? This will permanently delete purchase. You won\'t be able to revert this! Delete Payment? This will permanently delete payment. You won\'t be able to revert this! Delete Receipt? This will permanently delete receipt. You won\'t be able to revert this!
// delete item category dialog Can\'t Delete Item Category Delete Item Category? This Item Category is associated in items created earlier hence it can not be deleted. This will permanently delete Item Category. You won\'t be able to revert this!
//delete Metal Colour Delete Metal Color? This will permanently delete Metal Color. You won\'t be able to revert this!
//delete Group Delete Ledger Group? This will permanently delete Ledger Group. You won\'t be able to revert this! Delete Ledger Sub Group? This will permanently delete Ledger Sub Group. You won\'t be able to revert this!
///delete Ledger Delete Ledger? This will permanently delete Ledger. You won\'t be able to revert this!
//delete cust dialog Can\'t Delete Customer Delete Customer? This customer is associated in transactions carried out earlier hence it can not be deleted. This will permanently delete customer. You won\'t be able to revert this!
//delete supp dialog Can\'t Delete Supplier Delete Supplier? This supplier is associated in transactions carried out earlier hence it can not be deleted. This will permanently delete supplier. You won\'t be able to revert this!
//delete item dialog Can\'t Delete Item Delete Item? This Item is associated in transactions carried out earlier hence it can not be deleted. This will permanently delete item. You won\'t be able to revert this!
//delete branch dialog Can\'t Delete Branch Delete Branch? This Branch is associated in transactions carried out earlier hence it can not be deleted. This will permanently delete Branch. You won\'t be able to revert this!

You\'ve reached maximum transaction limit in free trial. Please upgrade plan to proceed. This app is an extension of Goldbook, an online account software for jewellery industry by Ternate Softwares. Goldbook makes it easier for everyone, from small-scale karigar to big manufacturing facilities. Reach out to us for assistance, feedback or any feature ideas. About Current plan: Subscription To upgrade your subscription: 1. Go to www.goldbook.in 2. Choose a plan right for you 3. Sign-In or proceed as Guest 4. Fill-in the billing information & make payment If you need any assistance, contact us at support@goldbook.in Read more about the available plans Smart Accounting App Create and send GST compliant invoices Get all your Transactions in one touch Manage Rate-Cut Track business performance on your dashboard Send professional looking error-free invoices to your customers All you need to run your business is easily accessible on the menu Whether cash or fine, manage rate-cut of any kind easily GoldBook Please install a document viewer to view the downloaded report file Supplier

Tap \'OK\' to log out, when you log back in you\'ll be able to create a new Pincode.\n\nIf you remember your Pincode, tap \'Cancel\' to go back.
